alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; St. Francois; Ste. Genevieve (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 4:49PM CDT until July 08 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Jefferson County in east central Missouri... Northwestern Ste. Genevieve County in southeastern Missouri... Northwestern St. Francois County in southeastern Missouri... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 448 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles south of Olympian Village, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Jefferson, northwestern Ste. Genevieve and northwestern St. Francois Counties, including the following locations... Valles Mill and French Village. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
